sections.heading: Officers; powers, duties; compensation; power to prescribe
sections.text: A city of the primary class may regulate and prescribe the powers, duties, and compensation of officers of the city not otherwise provided by law.SourceLaws 1901, c. 16, ยง 129, L, p. 140;R.S.1913, ยง 4460;C.S.1922, ยง 3845;C.S.1929, ยง 15-248;R
